conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a consistent isomeric cutaway with visible wall depth and height.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D geometry; walls have distinct top/side faces. Small perspective artifacts near corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room configuration and adjacency. Garage correctly separated. Door swings in 3D match 2D logic. Some minor wall length scaling issues in the entry area.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry, bathroom fixtures, and laundry area are accurately placed. Living room furniture is largely absent.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no text contamination. Clear lighting. One minor floor artifact near the bathroom door.

detected_errors.description: Lounge/Dining area lacks furniture shown or implied in the original plan's naming.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that maintains nearly all structural details and adjacencies from the original 2D floor plan.
